Development information
The Assembly, a new housing development in Hounslow that encompasses a beautifully landscaped garden square, forming the heart of the community and offering tranquil greenspace difficult to find so close to the capital and just moments from Hounslow high street.

In total, these houses for sale in Hounslow comprise 131 new homes across six buildings, providing modern living and an abundance of space. Located in Zone 4 and just a 5-minute walk from Hounslow East station, residents will benefit from excellent connectivity into Central London and to Heathrow airport via the Piccadilly line.

The London Borough of Hounslow is undergoing a large regeneration project, with proposals in place to transform the town centre building brand new high-quality housing and communal facilities. A new state of the art primary school has been built just a stones throw from the Assembly and is one of the largest schools in London.

The kitchen is discreetly tucked away and features a sleek matt handless kitchen with quartz worktops and an extensive range of Neff appliances. The luxury shower room benefits from an oversized shower, a custom designed vanity unit and striking tiling by Minoli. The apartment also features full fibre broadband to the premises (fftp) and a sophisticated Cat 6 cabling infrastructure for the efficient distribution of data.

Whitelocke House is located adjacent to the Hounslow Civic Centre, affording convenient access to the extensive amenities of this popular West London town. Hounslow Central underground station is just 160m away, giving regular, fast travel to both Central London and Heathrow Airport.

Completion estimated for August 2021.

detailedDescription:
Chase Buchanan are pleased to offer to the market this family townhouse, set in a popular private residential development in the heart of Osterley and within yards of the new Nishkam school.

The property comprises a spacious open plan lounge/dining room, conservatory, utility room, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, ground floor WC and several storage cupboards. Further benefits include off street parking and a beautiful rear garden.

Wyke Close is situated within a short walk of Osterley Tube Station (Piccadilly Line) and Syon Lane br Station (serving London Waterloo and a Tesco Superstore). The A4 is also very close by with links into central London and Heathrow. An early viewing is highly recommended by the vendors sole agents Chase Buchanan.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A superbly presented turn of the century character home which has been much improved and extended to provide four spacious bedrooms with two bathroom/shower rooms and an extended ground floor having much charm and character situated in A popular location on the whitton/hounslow borders.

For Sale:

A fabulous family home with much charm, character and great accommodation arranged over three floors. The ground floor comprises a lovely through living room, with large picture windows to the front and dining room leading to a delightful fitted kitchen, a cleverly designed study area and a really useful utility room / cloakroom. To the first floor the master and second bedroom are served by a stunning family bathroom, and the second floor features two further bedrooms and shower/wc. There is a really impressive size rear garden which extends to approx 70ft in depth with large patio area the remainder laid to lawn and with enough space for a children's play area as well as room for the adults to have their grown up toys as well.

Location:

Park Road is a popular residential road located on the Hounslow Whitton borders with local shops and Hounslow main line station close at hand. Hounslow town center is a short distance away as is Whitton high street with its varied shops and station. Murray Park, ideal for children and the family is a short walk away. The local area is well served by transport links to the surrounding area and local schools are also within easy striking distance.

title: 4 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
The apartment is located on the West corner of this popular purpose-built development on Chiswick High Road.

There is a communal entrance facing onto Chiswick High Road, situated on the second floor, the apartment has both lift and stair access. The entrance hall leads to two sizeable double bedrooms one of which has an ensuite bathroom and a private balcony overlooking the high road.

There is likewise a separate family bathroom and a well-proportioned kitchen with built-in appliances. At the end of the hallway is a generously proportioned reception room that opens onto a second private West facing balcony.

The property further benefits from a secure underground car parking space located underneath the building.

The apartment is well located on Chiswick High Road offering convenient access to Gunnersbury and Chiswick Park Underground Stations and an array of shops, bars and restaurants. The apartment is a short walk to Chiswick Business Park, the open spaces of Turnham Green and the River Thames. The A4/M4 is also close by.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A lovely character four bedroom semi-detached family home, situated in this sought after and convenient residential road which forms part of this requested conservation area. The excellent accommodation is arranged over three floors with the ground floor extended to provide a large kitchen breakfast room having bi folding doors to the lovely patio area and delightful southerly aspect rear garden.

For Sale:

Highly recommended for an internal viewing, this lovely older style character house features great accommodation with four bedrooms, three bath/shower rooms including a study/bed 5 with its own en-suite on the ground floor, plus a lovely through living room with two feature fireplaces and a well fitted kitchen / breakfast room, which over looks the southerly aspect rear garden.
A spacious property in a great location, if you are looking for a character residence which would suit the family buyer then our clients home is well worth a look.
Outside: The rear garden is well enclosed with mature trees and bushes providing good deal of seclusion and privacy. Immediately to the rear there is a delightful sun patio with inset pond, steps lead down to the formal gardens which are mainly laid to lawn.

Location:

St Stephens Road is located just south of Hounslow town centre which has a comprehensive range of shops, restaurants and leisure facilities. The main line station is within walking distance and a little further are Hounslow East and Hounslow Central Tube stations providing direct access via the Piccadilly line into London within 1/2 hour. Further bus routes provide links to Twickenham which is a short drive away and Heathrow Airport. Whilst major roads the M4/A4 service the M25 and central London.

detailedDescription:
Summary
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this large two double bedroom apartment situated in the heart of Brentford. Offering versatile accomodation, set out over two floors of approx. 859sq ft/79sq mtrs, this would be a brilliant purchase for either a First Time Buyer or a Buy to Let Investor.

Description
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this large two double bedroom apartment situated in the heart of Brentford. Offering versatile accommodation, set out over two floors of approx. 859sq ft. /79sq metres, this would be a brilliant purchase for either a First Time Buyer or a Buy to Let Investor, looking to reap the benefits that the area has to offer.
Compromising an open plan reception room/kitchen with big bright windows which lets an abundance of natural light seep through, with patio doors leading out onto a private balcony overlooking the stunning views of London, a modern and fully equipped kitchen, a plethora of storage throughout; including two external storage cupboards, a three piece bathroom suite and no onward chain.
Located moments away from Kew Bridge Mainline Station and Kew Gardens Tube Station, both offering easy access into The West End and The City. There is easy access using into Brentford and Ealing via the A4, both boasting an eclectic mix of high street stores, boutiques, coffee houses and restaurants. Kew Gardens is close by as is the River Thames providing excellent days out. Green Dragon Primary School is located 0.1 miles away and is Ofsted rated 'Good'. Early viewings are highly recommended to appreciate the space and value that this property has to offer.

Please call our Sales team for more information or to book a viewing on .

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Exquisite style and presentation throughout.

Location

Ashbourne Grove is situated off Chiswick Lane just off Chiswick High Road in a central location providing easy access to London via the A4, and the M4 to Heathrow airport and the west of England. Local underground stations include Turnham Green and Stamford Brook (both District line).

Description

This outstanding family house has been entirely finished and remodeled to an exquisitely high standard throughout by the current owner.

The ground floor offers a wide welcoming hallway which leads through to the double reception room which overlooks the garden at the front of the property via a large bay window. The combination of high ceilings, original features and parquet flooring creates a wonderful entertaining space.

The striking kitchen/dining room creates a perfect everyday family space which has been finished to an exquisitely high standard. The kitchen is awash with natural light due to large glass roof lights, which further enhances the attention to detail.

There are floor to ceiling bi-folding doors which open out to a fabulous private secluded low maintenance garden with a patio area for entertaining and artificial grass.
The ground floor also houses a useful cloakroom.

The impressive proportions are continued to the first floor which provides a double bedroom at the front of the house with a large bay window and fitted wardrobes. There are a further two bedrooms, one of which has views over the garden plus a stylish family bathroom.

The second floor houses the fabulous principle bedroom complete with extensive eave storage and an en suite shower room. This floor also provides a guest room, which doubles up as a utility room.

Overall this is a tremendously appealing and spacious house which has been cleverly remodeled to create a versatile and stylish family house.

Square Footage: 1817 sq ft

Live by the water, enjoying the open space and a wealth of nature. This 1 bed Shared Ownership apartment features luxurious interiors, spacious layouts, and private balcony. Move in from this Summer. Book your viewing today!

1 Bedroom apartment at The Moorings, Brentford available to purchase through Shared Ownership.

Financial Breakdown:
Full market value: £385,000
25% Share value: £96,250
10% deposit of 25%: £9,625
Rent on unowned share: £662 per month
Viewings by appointment only, book yours today!
An outstanding location

The Moorings offers thoughtfully designed apartments in a prime waterfront location within Brentford. Each home benefits from a terrace or a balcony providing private outside space, in addition to communal landscaped roof terraces with views across the River Brent.

This contemporary one-bedroom type 9 apartment features a modern interior that combines form and function, resulting in a beautifully designed home. Fitted with the latest a-rated appliances, impeccable finishes throughout and bright living areas, all constructed to the highest standards.

Plot A03.09 is a 547 sq ft apartment and available with Shared Ownership. The apartment has a North facing private balcony and full height windows in the bedroom.

Limited parking is available at The Moorings, please speak to the Sales Team for further information. Zip car membership is available to apartments without an undercroft parking space.

The video tour is representative. It shows the 2 bedroom Type 20 show apartment at The Moorings.

Situated in the city's garden
The Moorings is surrounded by some of London's best-loved parks and reserves. With such an abundance of green open spaces to explore, it couldn't be easier to escape the trappings of modern life and enjoy the very best of nature.

Take a stroll or a cycle along Brentford Lock or visit Syon Park and feel like you are in the deep countryside. Go further afield, across the River Thames, and find more green spaces such as Kew Gardens and Richmond Park.

The development is close to local shops, cafes, and restaurants along Brentford High Street and within easy reach is the original Westfield London.

What is shared ownership?

If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

Limited parking is available at The Moorings, please speak to the Sales Team for further information. Zip car membership is available to apartments without an undercroft parking space.

The video tour is representative. It shows the 2 bedroom Type 20 show apartment at The Moorings.

Situated in the city's garden
The Moorings is surrounded by some of London's best-loved parks and reserves. With such an abundance of green open spaces to explore, it couldn't be easier to escape the trappings of modern life and enjoy the very best of nature.

Take a stroll or a cycle along Brentford Lock or visit Syon Park and feel like you are in the deep countryside. Go further afield, across the River Thames, and find more green spaces such as Kew Gardens and Richmond Park.

The development is close to local shops, cafes, and restaurants along Brentford High Street and within easy reach is the original Westfield London.

What is shared ownership?

If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

shared ownership (Advertised price represents 25% share. Full market value £580,000). This stylishly-presented apartment is on the fourth floor of an impressive development between Chiswick Park Station and the new footbridge leading to Chiswick Business Park. The property has a 20' main room with floor-to-ceiling windows along the south-west side. Sliding doors open onto a large balcony which provides a very pleasant view of Gunnersbury Triangle Nature Reserve. The kitchen features sleek, grey, handle-less units and attractive herringbone tile splashbacks. The two bedrooms are similar-sized doubles and there is useful storage in the spacious entrance hall. Modern insulation standards, high performance glazing and a communal heating and hot water system make for a very good energy-efficiency rating. The shops and other amenities of Chiswick High Street are close by.

The first floor comprises a large newly fitted modern bathroom and four double bedrooms all offered in good condition and with fitted wardrobes.

Further benefits include a south-facing rear garden, brick built storage shed with power and lighting, ample off-street parking, gas central heating, downstairs WC, wonderful views over Murray Park and is located within a short walk to Whitton High Street, Whitton Train Station, local shops and local bus routes servicing Hounslow, Richmond, Twickenham and Isleworth.

Viewings are recommended to appreciate the size!

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautifully designed and immaculately presented four-bedroom family home situated on a quiet residential road.

A large reception room opens from the hallway and features wood flooring, high ceilings and a large double-glazed bay window, creating a relaxing living space.

It boasts high ceilings, a combination of contemporary design with traditional features. The property is bright, spacious and benefits from a recently extended kitchen featuring a solid marble work top and floor tiles with patio doors leading onto the garden and sky lights ensuring maximum light throughout. Further benefits include a downstairs shower room.

The first floor comprises three bedrooms and a beautifully finished bathroom. The bedrooms have original features, with the largest benefitting from built-in wardrobes and a large bay window.

The second floor is dedicated to the main bedroom bright and airy complete with an en-suite bathroom.

Externally there is a well maintained garden complete with a high spec brick built outbuilding perfect for a home office or could be easily made into liveable accommodation with rear access. Other benefits include a rear access and a driveway parking. Set moments from the park.

Conveniently located within a short 'walk' to St Margaret's station, it all adds up to a real ''village feel''. By car, one is just a couple of minutes' drive from the A316/M3 and in turn the motorway network is a short drive. The property is within close proximity to a number of sought after schools (see school checker for full list).Viewings highly recommended!

About High Street Quarter

Be part of an exciting new community in the heart of hounslow

High Street Quarter is a brand new development of one, two and three-bedroom homes in the centre of Hounslow.

Built around a new public square, you'll be at the heart of life with shops, restaurants and leisure facilities on your doorstep. Fast transport links are just a few minutes' walk away, making central London easily accessible.

This new lifestyle district will link the existing High Street to the Blenheim Centre to create a vibrant new destination in west London.

Leisure

Hounslow has a thriving and diverse town centre - comprising a mixture of high street stores and independent retailers. For sports fans, Twickenham Stadium is 2 miles away and Wyke Green Golf Club is just a 12-minute drive. There are also numerous gyms and leisure centres to choose from in the immediate area. Hounslow Heath, a local nature reserve and one of the largest parks in the borough, is also a short walk away.

Education

A number of schools in Hounslow have been rated 'outstanding' by Ofsted including nearby Hounslow Heath Junior School and Hounslow Heath Infant and Nursery School.

Transport

Hounslow is located in Zone 4 in the Borough of Hounslow. Hounslow High Street benefits from excellent transport links, with Hounslow East & Hounslow Central Underground Stations both a 5-minute walk away and Hounslow Overground Station just a 10-minute walk. Heathrow Airport is a short drive away or 15 minutes on the tube.

Opening Hours

Monday 12:30 - 17:30, Tuesday-Sunday 10:00 - 17:30

detailedDescription:
A rare opportunity to fully develop and modernise a substantial semi-detached family house on this highly sought-after street, with planning permission already granted.

A rare opportunity to acquire an imposing semi-detached family house, with off-street parking, on one of Chiswick's prettiest addresses. Planning Permission has been granted for a basement and side extensions to the ground and first floor, significantly increasing the overall size and width of the property. The rear garden is just under 40ft long, comfortably accommodating the construction of a summer house or home office. The project might be eligible for reduced VAT on the building and renovation costs at 5% as it has been unoccupied for more than two years, or 0% if the house is demolished with facade retention as approved in the planning permission. This is subject to applicable government rules, regulations and approvals. The house is currently arranged over three floors and benefits from good natural light throughout and open views over gardens and the Hogarth Tennis Club to the rear.

Homefield Road is a prestigious residential street running south off Chiswick High Road. Tree-lined and wider than average, Homefield Road is moments from the river and the high street, which is lined with shops, cafes and restaurants. The property is well connected with two underground stations Turnham Green Terrace and Chiswick High Road which are both nearby.

The property is excellent condition throughout and further benefits from a rear low maintenance garden and a driveway to the front for three cars.

The layout comprises; smart, extended fitted kitchen with breakfast bar and direct access onto the garden, light and spacious living room with a separate area for dining and a ground floor shower room. On the first floor there are two double bedrooms as well as a main family bathroom and there are two further good size bedrooms on the second floor.

Positioned in this sought after green belt location close to shops, schools and public transport links as well as great motorway links for the commuter by car.

Property Description

This property is for sale by Online Auction. The Online Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will have 56 working days to exchange and complete once the draft contract has been issued by the vendors solicitor. Allowing the additional time to exchange and complete on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer with be required to put down a non-refundable reservation fee. The fee will be a fixed fee including the Vat, this secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to agree to our terms and conditions prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found on the online Auction website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is typically no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by goto Auctions.

General Information

Auctioneer's Comments

This property is for sale by Online Auction which is a flexible and buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will not be exchanging contracts on the fall of the virtual hammer but will be given 56 working days in which to complete the transaction, from the date the Draft Contract is issued by the seller’s solicitor. By giving a buyer time to exchange contracts on the property, means normal residential finance can be sort.

The Buyer’s Premium secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. Fees paid to the Auctioneer may be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property and be included in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Further clarification on this must be sought from your legal representative. The buyer will be required to sign a Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Info Pack which can be downloaded for free from our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to make payment of a non-refundable Buyers Premium of £5,400 including VAT plus an administration charge of £354 including VAT, a total of £5,754. This secures the transaction and takes the property off the market.

The Buyer’s Premium and administration charge are in addition to the final negotiated selling price.

detailedDescription:
Summary
Boston Park Road which is off Windmill Road in Brentford/South Ealing is ideally located for Brentford train station (Southern Western Railway) with a short journey straight to Waterloo within 30 minutes and a short walk to Northfields tube station (Piccadilly line).

Description
This well-presented four bedroom family house on a residential street in Brentford offering circa £1800 sq. Ft. Is perfectly located for access to the M4 motorway network and other transport links. On the ground floor the property offers a vast 25' bright & airy reception room, a separate kitchen, a rear reception/dining room with access to the rear garden, whilst the upper floor offers a master double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, three further bedrooms, a family bathroom and loft storage which is partly boarded. Other benefits include front & rear garden, a useful 15' cellar and loft potential (stpp). The property is a short walk away from Brentford train station, Northfields & Boston Manor tube station (Piccadilly line) as well as all the local amenities, cafés, restaurants, supermarkets and nearby schools such as Brentford Schools for girls, Little Garden Brentford preschool, Mount Carmel, Fielding, Gunnersbury for boys & Elthorne. Ealing Broadway, Chiswick & Shepherds Bush are within a short drive offering a variety of super markets, restaurants, bars and cafes and the popular Westfield's shopping mall including the cinema complex.

address: Cavendish Parade, Bath Road, Hounslow TW4
detailedDescription:
A lovely 2 bedroom top floor Shared Ownership apartment with a bright double aspect living room and private terrace.

The open plan kitchen, dining and living room comes with a fully fitted kitchen with Bosch and Hotpoint appliances including fridge freezer, ceramic hob, oven, extractor fan and dishwasher.

You'll find a Hotpoint washer/dryer in the utility cupboard and two further storage cupboards.

The spacious bedrooms benefit from a Southern aspect and access to a second private terrace.

The master bedroom also boasts a fitted wardrobe and an en-suite shower room.

The family bathroom includes a full-sized bath with overhead shower, WC and a wash basin, and a heated towel rail.

Cavendish Gardens
Cavendish Gardens is a vibrant new development moments from Hounslow West station. Forming part of Hounslow's regeneration, this exciting new addition to the neighbourhood features Shared Ownership homes that are surrounded by clusters of meticulously landscaped gardens.

Thanks to excellent bus links, direct access to the Piccadilly line and the airport (a 6-minute Tube ride away), Hounslow strongly appeals to commuters and culture-vultures alike. Whilst the connections to the excitement of Central London are exceptional, residents of Cavendish Gardens won't need to venture far to enjoy themselves due to Hounslow's buzzing community of independently-owned stores, family-friendly cafes, and bustling restaurants.

Living here means having historic landmarks such as two of the last surviving country estates in London; Osterley Park and Syon Park; on your doorstep. But perhaps best of all is the easy access to green spaces such as Bushy Park: This 1099 acre Royal Park features scenic waterways, gardens, grassland and free-roaming deer. The Borough of Hounslow is home to 10 local nature reserves, including Hounslow Heath, and residents can also enjoy nearby Kew Gardens.

Min Ownership Percent: 40%
Min Share value: £163,000

Register your interest now to find out more.

Please note - priority will be given to those living or working in the Borough of Hounslow.

Wheelchair accessible apartments available.

About High Street Quarter

Be part of an exciting new community in the heart of hounslow

High Street Quarter is a brand new development of one, two and three-bedroom homes in the centre of Hounslow.

Built around a new public square, you'll be at the heart of life with shops, restaurants and leisure facilities on your doorstep. Fast transport links are just a few minutes' walk away, making central London easily accessible.

This new lifestyle district will link the existing High Street to the Blenheim Centre to create a vibrant new destination in west London.

Leisure

Hounslow has a thriving and diverse town centre - comprising a mixture of high street stores and independent retailers. For sports fans, Twickenham Stadium is 2 miles away and Wyke Green Golf Club is just a 12-minute drive. There are also numerous gyms and leisure centres to choose from in the immediate area. Hounslow Heath, a local nature reserve and one of the largest parks in the borough, is also a short walk away.

Education

A number of schools in Hounslow have been rated 'outstanding' by Ofsted including nearby Hounslow Heath Junior School and Hounslow Heath Infant and Nursery School.

Transport

Hounslow is located in Zone 4 in the Borough of Hounslow. Hounslow High Street benefits from excellent transport links, with Hounslow East & Hounslow Central Underground Stations both a 5-minute walk away and Hounslow Overground Station just a 10-minute walk. Heathrow Airport is a short drive away or 15 minutes on the tube.

Opening Hours

Monday 12:30 - 17:30, Tuesday-Sunday 10:00 - 17:30

Situated in a most pleasant cul de sac off of the Great West Road. With excellent communication into Central London and Heathrow, Osterley Park, Wyke Green Golf Club and Syon Lane Station serving Waterloo are all local facilities. This is a 1930's built semi detached property with shared drive to garage. The accommodation comprises entrance hallway, through lounge with double doors to conservatory and kitchen. The first floor provides three bedrooms and family bathroom. Gas central heating and double glazed windows have been installed. There is off street parking to the front of the property and a very pretty rear landscaped garden. Further benefits are a fully boarded loft with shelving.

agency_name: John D Wood & Co. - St Margarets
detailedDescription:
A spacious 4/5 bedroom Victorian family house located in this sought after residential area on the borders of Old Isleworth, close to the open spaces of St John's Gardens and within a pleasant walk to the River Thames, Syon House and the historic riverside pub - The London Apprentice.

Presented for sale in superb condition, the property has been imaginatively extended by the current owners, who have really maximised the space on the first and second floors. There is a flexible layout which currently provides much needed live to work space, but could provide 5 bedrooms if required.

In further detail the ground floor has a welcoming entrance hall opening to a double aspect open plan reception dining room with a bay window to the front, decorative plaster ceiling, exposed wooden floorboards and a feature fireplace. French windows open at the rear onto the garden beyond. There is under stairs storage, a useful downstairs shower and WC and a stunning kitchen with a vaulted ceiling -complete with two large skylights. The kitchen is well appointed and has a breakfast area to the rear. Architects drawings and structural calculations have been submitted to the local authority for a full width kitchen extension and approval is anticipated very shortly.

On the upper two floors can be found a further 5 rooms and two bathrooms. This includes the principal bedroom with en suite shower, which is currently open to a smaller double room, currently used as a home office. A straightforward change on this floor could be made to adapt this into a fifth bedroom.

To the rear of the property is a wonderful private garden which has a paved and decked seating area leading to the main lawn and then to a further covered area ideal for al-fresco dining.

Grainger Road runs between Linkfield Road and St John's Road and is approximately equidistant from central Isleworth with its mainline station to London Waterloo. There is a lovely walk via Mill Plat Lane to the river Thames, which takes less than 10 minutes and the wide open spaces of Syon Park are a little further on foot. The area is also well served by the H37 bus route which connects to St Margarets and Richmond to the East and Hounslow to the West. There are several highly regarded state and private schools within a 2 mile radius.

detailedDescription:
Summary
Three bedroom mid terraced leasehold house sold with no onward chain, located within a stone throw of Feltham Town Centre and Feltham Train Station

description
Sold with no onward chain, this three bedroom mid terraced house is conveniently located in a small cul-de-sac location, within a stone's throw of Feltham Train Station and town centre. On the ground floor of the property has a front aspect kitchen, leading through to an ample sized open planned living/dining area. The property then leads onto to a large garden. The property also benefits from a down stairs WC. The first floor consists of two double bedrooms and a single bedroom.

Bowsley Court, Highfield Road is situated in an excellent central location providing easy access to local amenities and transport links being only a short distance away from Feltham Railway Station. This provides frequent links into London Waterloo within 30 minutes.

Auctioneer's Comments
This property is offered through Modern Method of Auction. Should you view, offer or bid your data will be shared with the Auctioneer, iamsold Limited. This method requires both parties to complete the transaction within 56 days, allowing buyers to proceed with mortgage finance (subject to lending criteria, affordability and survey).

The buyer is required to sign a reservation agreement and make payment of a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 4.2% of the purchase price including VAT, subject to a minimum of £6,000.00 including VAT. This fee is paid in addition to purchase price and will be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Buyers will be required to complete an identification process with iamsold and provide proof of how the purchase would be funded.

The property has a Buyer Information Pack containing documents about the property. The documents may not tell you everything you need to know, so you must complete your own due diligence before bidding. A sample of the Reservation Agreement and terms and conditions are contained within this pack. The buyer will also make payment of £300 inc VAT towards the preparation cost of the pack.

The estate agent and auctioneer may recommend the services of other providers to you, in which they will be paid for the referral. These services are optional, and you will be advised of any payment, in writing before any services are accepted. Listing is subject to a start price and undisclosed reserve price that can change.

We currently hold lease details as displayed above, should you require further information please contact the branch. Please note additional fees could be incurred for items such as leasehold packs.

detailedDescription:
Summary
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this three bedroom, three bathroom mid-terraced family home, tucked away on a quiet tree lined residential street in the heart of Chiswick.

Description
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this three bedroom, three bathroom mid-terraced family home, tucked away on a quiet tree lined residential street in the heart of Chiswick. Having been lovingly looked after by the same family for many years, this would provide the perfect headquarters for a family looking to lay down roots within the area.

Currently arranged over three floors and offering in excess of 970sq ft/91 sq metres including a separate eat-in-kitchen, reception room, downstairs shower room, two double bedrooms; one of which has an en-suite bathroom and a further single bedroom. The rear garden is also easily maintainable and has an outbuilding which has electricity, perfect for using as a home office. Further benefits include a plethora of storage throughout and a private driveway with space for two cars.

Bridge Street is a fantastically central Chiswick location, with particular proximity to Chiswick High Road with its huge variety of Supermarkets including Waitrose, Marks & Spencer's, Tesco's & Sainsbury's. Belmont Primary School is a stone's throw away which is Ofsted rated 'Outstanding', as well as both Turnham Green (Zone 2) and Chiswick Park Underground (Zone 3) Stations. There is also easy access to central London via the A4, and to Heathrow Airport and the west of England via the M4.

agency_name: Fabrica by A2 Dominion - Cavendish Gardens
address: Cavendish Parade, Bath Road, Hounslow TW4
detailedDescription:
A spacious 1 bedroom third floor Shared Ownership apartment with a lovely west-facing balcony.

Inside you'll find a spacious hallway leading to an open plan kitchen, dining and living room. The kitchen is fully fitted with Bosch and Hotpoint appliances including fridge freezer, ceramic hob, oven, extractor fan and dishwasher. You'll find a Hotpoint washer/dryer in the utility cupboard and an extra cupboard for more storage. The bedroom boasts a fitted wardrobe for added convenience. The bathroom includes a full-sized bath with overhead shower, WC and a wash basin, and a heated towel rail.

Cavendish Gardens
Cavendish Gardens is a vibrant new development moments from Hounslow West station. Forming part of Hounslow's regeneration, this exciting new addition to the neighbourhood features Shared Ownership homes that are surrounded by clusters of meticulously landscaped gardens.

Thanks to excellent bus links, direct access to the Piccadilly line and the airport (a 6-minute Tube ride away), Hounslow strongly appeals to commuters and culture-vultures alike. Whilst the connections to the excitement of Central London are exceptional, residents of Cavendish Gardens won't need to venture far to enjoy themselves due to Hounslow's buzzing community of independently-owned stores, family-friendly cafes, and bustling restaurants.

Living here means having historic landmarks such as two of the last surviving country estates in London; Osterley Park and Syon Park; on your doorstep. But perhaps best of all is the easy access to green spaces such as Bushy Park: This 1099 acre Royal Park features scenic waterways, gardens, grassland and free-roaming deer. The Borough of Hounslow is home to 10 local nature reserves, including Hounslow Heath, and residents can also enjoy nearby Kew Gardens.

Shared Ownership Information
Full Market price: £305,000
Min Ownership Percent: 40%
Min Share value: £122,000

Register your interest now to find out more.

Please note - priority will be given to those living or working in the Borough of Hounslow.

Wheelchair accessible apartments available.

title: 3 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
A Brand New Two Bedroom Apartment In The Iconic Twickenham Gateway Development

Help to buy available - A brand new two bedroom apartment in the iconic Twickenham Gateway development. This stunning apartment has been finished to an exceptional standard throughout and briefly comprises a large open plan kitchen/living room with a contemporary designed Leicht German kitchen, a principal bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a stylish shower room, second double bedroom and a modern bathroom suite designed by Porcelanosa. Additionally the apartment benefits from an impressive private terrace, engineered timber flooring in the kitchen/living area, secure bicycle storage and smart video entry system.

Twickenham Gateway offers a new way of living, combining spacious, well-designed apartments with the ultimate in convenience to give you more time to enjoy life. Landscaping, green roofs and a new public plaza complement the contemporary buildings. There are cycle spaces for every apartment, and the development has its own shops including the recent additions of a Marks & Spencer food store and a Sainsburys. There is also a new riverside walkway which also features a children’s play space.

Twickenham Station is just one minute from your front door making the daily commute to central London a breeze. There are also lots of opportunities for days out at the weekend via Twickenham’s well-connected rail service. Each apartment is sold with the benefit of a lifetime Zipcar car club membership. Vehicles will be available to hire from the underground station car park, giving you maximum flexibility whether it’s for a trip to the supermarket or a last minute weekend away

The charms of south-west London are easily explored on foot or by bike include nearby parks such as Marble Hill, The Royal Botanic Gardens in Kew and Richmond Park, the largest of London’s Royal Parks. Twickenham offers a range of amenities including Starbucks, Nandos, Waitrose and Marks & Spencer. Nearby Richmond offers a vibrant mix of high street, boutique, designer and antique shops

address: Cavendish Parade, Bath Road, Hounslow TW4
detailedDescription:
A spacious 1 bedroom third floor Shared Ownership apartment with a lovely west-facing balcony.

Inside you'll find a spacious hallway leading to an open plan kitchen, dining and living room. The kitchen is fully fitted with Bosch and Hotpoint appliances including fridge freezer, ceramic hob, oven, extractor fan and dishwasher. You'll find a Hotpoint washer/dryer in the utility cupboard and an extra cupboard for more storage. The bedroom boasts a fitted wardrobe for added convenience. The bathroom includes a full-sized bath with overhead shower, WC and a wash basin, and a heated towel rail.

Cavendish Gardens
Cavendish Gardens is a vibrant new development moments from Hounslow West station. Forming part of Hounslow's regeneration, this exciting new addition to the neighbourhood features Shared Ownership homes that are surrounded by clusters of meticulously landscaped gardens.

Thanks to excellent bus links, direct access to the Piccadilly line and the airport (a 6-minute Tube ride away), Hounslow strongly appeals to commuters and culture-vultures alike. Whilst the connections to the excitement of Central London are exceptional, residents of Cavendish Gardens won't need to venture far to enjoy themselves due to Hounslow's buzzing community of independently-owned stores, family-friendly cafes, and bustling restaurants.

Living here means having historic landmarks such as two of the last surviving country estates in London; Osterley Park and Syon Park; on your doorstep. But perhaps best of all is the easy access to green spaces such as Bushy Park: This 1099 acre Royal Park features scenic waterways, gardens, grassland and free-roaming deer. The Borough of Hounslow is home to 10 local nature reserves, including Hounslow Heath, and residents can also enjoy nearby Kew Gardens.

A stylish modern apartment overlooking the river in a luxurious waterfront development next to Kew Bridge. The property benefits from underground parking and an expansive wrap-around balcony with river views, and has access to on-site facilities including a concierge and a residents' gym. The apartment is also equipped with state-of-the-art modern features including a Comfort Cooling system, underfloor heating and spot lighting.

The apartment itself features a smart fully fitted kitchen complete with an island, open-plan living room with wooden flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows, a guest cloakroom, two double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and en suite bathrooms, and a master bedroom with a four-piece en suite bathroom. The living room and all three bedrooms feature French windows which offer access to the balcony.

Quayside House forms part of the prestigious 8 Kew Bridge Road development, conceived by award-winning developer Berkeley Homes. In addition to the concierge, fitness suite and well-tended communal grounds, the development offers residents an abundance of on-site amenities including a supermarket, cafe, restaurant and pub. A further range of shopping and dining opportunities are available on both sides of the bridge in Kew, Strand-on-the-Green and Chiswick. detailedDescription:
As you enter the house, you are greeted by an impressive floating staircase and a spectacular glass ceiling, with doors leading to two additional reception rooms and a 25-foot-long living area with direct access to the rear garden. To the side of the house is a 21-foot-long kitchen/diner, as well as a downstairs shower room and the fifth double bedroom. This property's ground floor is finished to a high standard and is designed for entertaining guests and family.

Following the high standard set on the ground floor, the first floor has four enormous double bedrooms, all of which have built-in wardrobes. All of these bedrooms have access to the luxurious family bathroom, which has been finished to a high standard. The family bathroom is fully tiled and equipped with a large luxurious mirror, a bath with jets for a relaxing experience, and a walk-in shower with a rain head and full body jets.

Outside, the property benefits from being located on one of the larger plots, measuring 0.28 acres in size. The gated driveway to the front has parking for a large number of cars, an attached garage, and side access to the property's rear. The 70ft long lawned garden to the rear of the property provides plenty of space to entertain and enjoy those summer days with family and friends.

Raleigh Way is located in the popular Hanworth Park Estate and is close to excellent transportation links. It is also close to excellent state and private schools and has easy access to the A316, M3 and Heathrow Airport.

There is great potential to further extent to the side, into the loft and to the rear (subject to planing permission and own investigation).

title: 2 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Immaculately finished Glebe Estate house with superb open plan living space.

Location

Duke Road is situated in the Glebe Estate within close proximity to the shops and restaurants of Chiswick High Road and Turnham Green Underground station (District line). This location offers easy access to central London via the A4, and via the M4 for Heathrow Airport and the west of England.

Chiswick High Road, famous for its boulevard-style pavements, is full of quality independent outlets and an increasingly up-market selection of high street names which run from Hammersmith through to the Chiswick roundabout. Chiswick is a great place to shop and eat. Tesco, Sainsbury's, Waitrose and Marks and Spencer are all represented. Serving meat lovers are Macken Bros, Wyndham House and Ginger Pig butchers. Covent Garden Fishmongers do as their name suggests. Bayley & Sage have an amazing cheese counter and the Grove Park Deli on Fauconberg Road is also very popular. The Old Cinema provides Antique Vintage Retro Collections. Attractive fruit, vegetable and flower stalls add colour to the High Road. High Street banks, chemists, dry cleaners, beauty spas, fashion shops, off licences and general repair shops as well as many other outlets means there is no need to go elsewhere.

Among Chiswick's fine dining choices are Michelin-starred La Trompette on Devonshire Road and Hedone on Chiswick High Road. Similarly renowned is Le Vacherin on South Parade. High Road House and its Brasserie are part of the Soho House empire. Numerous high street restaurants such as Honest Burgers, Cote, Byrons and Pizza Express cater for family tastes.

Lord Burlington's Chiswick House is a picturesque, 18th-century Palladian mansion with gardens designed by William Kent. The birthplace of the English Landscape Movement, the gardens, with their statuary hedges and vistas, has had a £12 million makeover which includes a new café by architects Caruso St John. In recent years Chiswick House grounds have played host to Soho House group's House Festival, enticing the great and the good of the media industry with performers who are both nationally renowned and locally resident.

Bedford Park, London's first garden suburb, was built between 1875 and 1886 as part of the Arts & Crafts revival. Victorian property developer Jonathan Carr instructed lead architect Richard Norman Shaw (alongside ej May, W Wilson and ew Godwin) in the building of a collection of houses and studios that now form a conservation area and are for the most part Grade II listed. Many of these houses feature elements of styling from William Morris, to whose legacy is dedicated the William Morris Society at Kelmscott House on Upper Mall.

Description

An immaculately presented four bedroom house nestled in the desirable Glebe Estate.

On the ground floor there is superb entertaining space with a contemporary and impressive open plan arrangement. An elegant reception room to the front of the house boasts a lovely bay window and a working fireplace gives the dining room a warm and homely feel.

The kitchen/dining space enjoys an abundance of natural light from the skylights and stylish folding glass doors. The contemporary kitchen provides access onto the smart paved garden and is a real sun trap.

The first floor provides two good sized double bedrooms, a further bedroom and a family bathroom. The second floor has been designed to provide a private master suite which incorporates a dressing room, a double master bedroom
with excellent storage in the eaves and a shower room.

The house has been beautifully remodelled and fitted with high quality appliances, with the implementation of underfloor heating on the ground floor and in the bathrooms reinforcing this.

Square Footage: 1500 sq ft

guide price £900,000 - £950,000

An immaculately presented four bedroom mansion flat positioned on the top floor of this highly desired Edwardian building located in the heart of the Grove Park area of Chiswick.

Description
An immaculately presented four bedroom mansion flat positioned on the top floor of this highly desired Edwardian building located in the heart of the Grove Park area of Chiswick. The accommodation comprises of four double bedrooms, two of which have beautiful big bay windows overlooking the communal gardens, with a good sized family bathroom, a reception room and a separate kitchen.

This amazing flat has an abundance of charm throughout and includes many original features such as high ceilings and from the main reception room views over Sutton Court gardens. Further benefits include being sold with no onward chain and offering a Share of Freehold.

The residents of Sutton Court have access to well-kept communal gardens, as well as private parking and a secure communal storage room suitable for storing bikes. Local shops and restaurants found along Fauconberg Road are only a short stroll away, as well as being close to several transport links, including Chiswick Station, Chiswick Underground (District Line) and Turnham Green (District & Piccadilly Lines), as well as several buses going to Hammersmith, Brentford & Ealing.

Also located within 0.2 miles away from the Ofsted rated 'Outstanding', Grove Park Primary School. Chiswick High Road is also within reach as well as the open spaces of Chiswick House and the River Thames.

detailedDescription: Located moments from the River Thames and in the catchment area of the "outstanding" St Peter's Primary School and Latymer Upper School is this lovely three bedroom mid-terrace Victorian Townhouse with oodles of charm and character. To the first floor there are two, air-conditioned, double bedrooms with expansive built in storage, further single bedroom and a modern family bathroom with Jacuzzi style bath and separate shower cubicle. Further benefits include a large loft storage space that is boarded, with pull down ladder and lighting and the potential to extend to the rear / side / second floor all subject to the usual planning consents. Beaumont Court is one of three mansion blocks on Sutton Lane North just across from Turnham Green. In close proximity are Chiswick Park Underground station (District Line) and Gunnersbury Overground/Underground station.
There is also easy access to central London via the A4, and to Heathrow Airport and the west of England via the M4.

Description

Located on the fourth floor of this popular mansion block with lift access and a dedicated onsite estate manager.

This superb two bedroom flat boasts a light and spacious reception room with stylish wooden floors. There is also a separate well-appointed kitchen.

Both the bedrooms are well proportioned and there is a good size bathroom with a shower above the bath.

Beaumont Court has an array of communal amenities including a swimming pool, a BBQ area and well maintained gardens.

Square Footage: 687 sq ft

detailedDescription:

The property has access to a concierge service, residents' gym and communal courtyard gardens within the development, and benefits from lift access. The apartment itself consists of a smart fully fitted kitchen, open-plan living room with wooden flooring and French windows leading out onto the balcony, modern family bathroom and two double bedrooms, one of which features built-in wardrobes and an en suite bathroom.

Masson House is part of the popular Kew Bridge West development and offers residents access to a range of facilities including a concierge, residents' gym and communal gardens. The property is situated moments from Kew Bridge Mainline station and the Chiswick Roundabout, offering excellent transport links both into and out of the city centre, as well as a range of local shops, restaurants and other local amenities in the Kew Bridge, Chiswick and Brentford areas nearby.

detailedDescription:
An impressive family home with accommodation arranged over three floors and featuring four bedrooms, two bathrooms with one being en-suite to the master bedroom. There is a lovely through living area arranged as two distinct areas, dining area and lounge area, a modern kitchen and a lovely south west facing rear garden complete the picture.

For Sale:

A lovely family home which has been Cleverley extended into the loft to provide a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, this is in addition to the family bathroom located on the first floor which serves the original three bedrooms. The property has been well presented by our clients and the accommodation features two distinct reception areas which are open plan, a modern fitted kitchen as well as the four bedrooms and two bathrooms. All in all a great home, ideally positioned, close to local facilities and Whitton high street shops and main line station.
Outside: To the front there is a paviour driveway providing of street parking. To the rear the garden extends to approx, 60ft has a patio area leading to a lawned area, all well enclosed with a garden shed to the rear and best of all a south west aspect.

Location:

Whitton Dene is located on the borders of Whitton, Hounslow and Isleworth, with many facilities close at hand. Whitton high street is within walking distance with a good selection of shops, restaurants, cafe's and supermarkets as well as the main line station, which offers a frequent service to Richmond and London Waterloo. The property is also located within the Richmond Borough.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A well-presented semi-detached house in a popular neighbourhood moments from Turnham Green in Chiswick. The property features a large south-facing garden and a driveway with space for multiple cars.

The ground floor offers an excellent living and entertaining space, and consists of a large galley-style kitchen and dining room, complete with a kitchen island and tiled flooring, conservatory, and two additional living rooms, one of which features a bay window and the other offers access to the garden. This level also provides access to the basement, which offers an excellent storage space.

The first floor hosts a large living room with a balcony, along with the master suite, which consists of a double bedroom with built-in wardrobes, a dressing room and a five-piece en suite bathroom. Three additional bedrooms, two of which feature built-in wardrobes, are located on the second floor, which also hosts a family bathroom, utility room and access to the loft and eaves storage.

Barrowgate Road occupies an enviable location in Chiswick, situated half-way between the Chiswick High Road and Chiswick House and Gardens. Residents are able to access the town centre's outstanding selection of independent and high-street shops, cafes and restaurants, alongside convenient amenities including banks, gyms and a post office. Gunnersbury Station, which offers both Underground and National Rail connections, is close by, and commuters can also easily access Chiswick Park Underground and Chiswick Mainline stations. The property is also close to several well-regarded schools, including The Falcons Pre-Preparatory School for Boys, The William Hogarth School, Grove Park Primary School, and Strand on the Green Junior School.

This fantastic apartment is situated on Twickenham Road, with Twickenham, St Margarets and Richmond town centres close by. The historical Georgian riverside at Old Isleworth is also a short walk away.

agency_name: Legal & General Affordable Homes - The Moorings
detailedDescription:
Brunch In Brentford | Saturday 31st July 2021 | 10am - 1pm

Join us for a unique opportunity to explore The Moorings, Brentford and find out how Shared Ownership could help you take that step on to the property ladder sooner than you think.

Oh... And enjoy a selection of high quality handmade pastries, sandwiches, brioches, wraps and more - courtesy of brunch specialists Feather & Heart.

To book a place register your interest and our dedicated Sales Consultant will be delighted in helping you book your appointment.

Please note: In order to maintain social distancing, all visits to The Moorings will be by appointment only.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Live by the water, enjoying the open space and a wealth of nature. This 3 bed Shared Ownership apartment features luxurious interiors, spacious layouts, and private balcony. Move in from this Summer. Book your viewing today!

3 Bedroom apartment at The Moorings, Brentford available to purchase through Shared Ownership.

Available to purchase for a 25% share at £166,250
Financial Breakdown:
Full market value: £665,000
10% deposit of 25%: £16,625
Rent on unowned share: £1,143 per month
Viewings by appointment only, book yours today!
An outstanding location

The Moorings offers thoughtfully designed apartments in a prime waterfront location within Brentford. Each home benefits from a terrace or a balcony providing private outside space, in addition to communal landscaped roof terraces with views across the River Brent.

This contemporary three-bedroom type 11 apartment features a modern interior that combines form and function, resulting in a beautifully designed home. Fitted with the latest a-rated appliances, impeccable finishes throughout and bright living areas, all constructed to the highest standards.

Plot B04.02 is a 998 sq ft apartment and available with Shared Ownership. This apartment has a South-East facing balcony and has full height windows throughout.

Limited parking is available at The Moorings, please speak to the Sales Team for further information. Zip car membership is available to apartments without an undercroft parking space.

Situated in the city's garden
The Moorings is surrounded by some of London's best-loved parks and reserves. With such an abundance of green open spaces to explore, it couldn't be easier to escape the trappings of modern life and enjoy the very best of nature.

Take a stroll or a cycle along Brentford Lock or visit Syon Park and feel like you are in the deep countryside. Go further afield, across the River Thames, and find more green spaces such as Kew Gardens and Richmond Park.

The development is close to local shops, cafes, and restaurants along Brentford High Street and within easy reach is the original Westfield London.

What is shared ownership?

If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

The video tour is representative. It shows the 2 bedroom Type 20 show apartment at The Moorings.

detailedDescription:
A rare opportunity to acquire an immaculately presented home in the heart of Chiswick. This property was one of the first houses built in the Glebe estate by George Grantham in 1870 and offers generous proportions and a wealth of attractive features.

On entering the property on the raised ground floor, there is a spacious double reception room with a Juliet balcony overlooking an attractive south west facing garden. The lower ground floor provides a guest bedroom, dining room, W.C./utility room and a modern kitchen with double doors leading out to the garden. On the first and second floors there is a shower room, three further bedrooms and an en-suite bathroom.

Devonshire Road is in a popular and sought-after location, famous for its various boutique shops, cafes, wine bars and the Michelin starred restaurant, La Trompette. The property is well-positioned off Chiswick High Road within close proximity to Turnham Green (District line) station, local bus routes and the A4/M4. The property is offered with no onward chain.

A fantastic three bedroom detached family home, located within half a mile of a mainline train station and under ground station. Ideal property for a family or investor.

On entrance to the property is a large front driveway which offers off street parking for three to four cars. The property also benefits from a garage to the side, which allows additional parking or the potential to be converted into another room (subject to planning permission). Leading upstairs, you will find two large double bedrooms and a single bedroom along with a three piece family bathroom suite.

Situated within only 10 minutes of Feltham mainline station with its direct links to Waterloo as well as a 15 minutes-walk of Hatton Cross underground station, or five minutes on the H25/H26/203 bus which stops outside of the property. address: Hyperion Tower, Pump House Crescent, Brentford TW8
detailedDescription:
A wonderfully modern three bedroom apartment with two secure underground parking spaces, concierge, landscaped courtyard, and residents gym, in a premium development, moments from the River Thames in Brentford. This property benefits from fitted storage, wooden flooring, a video-Entryphone system and lift access. The property itself consists of an open-plan living room, fully fitted kitchen, private balcony with another private wrap-around balcony, modern family bathroom, and three double bedrooms, two of which feature fitted wardrobes and the master bedroom also benefitting from a modern en suite.

Hyperion Tower is part of the popular Kew Bridge West development and offers residents access to a range of facilities including a concierge, residents' gym, communal gardens and this particular apartment also comes with a secure storage room. The property is situated moments from Kew Bridge Mainline station and the Chiswick Roundabout, offering excellent transport links both into and out of the city centre, as well as a range of local shops, restaurants and other local amenities in the Kew Bridge, Chiswick and Brentford areas nearby.

Benefiting from a large reception room, four good-sized bedrooms, two bathrooms, a separate kitchen, a large driveway for two cars and a massive rear garden with a storage garage at the back.

Situated in a fantastic location in the heart of Hounslow within close proximity to excellent schools and amenities with Hounslow Central and Hounslow West underground (Piccadilly line) located close by.

This property offers potential for conversion in to multiple units. Alternatively, it could also be perfect for a HMO with massive scope for extension.

detailedDescription:
An immaculately presented two bedroom penthouse set within a highly sought after modern private development. Spanning more than 800 sq ft, the apartment comes with allocated off street parking, two private balconies, walk in wardrobe and stunning views of Redlees Park. Further benefits include a video Entryphone system, ample storage and spotlighting.

The apartment consists of an open plan living room, fully fitted kitchen, a very stylish family bathroom, and two double bedrooms, one of which features a walk in wardrobe and another private balcony.

The development is conveniently located on Worton Road, providing access to excellent schools, the amenities of Old Isleworth and St Margaret’s Village, the River Thames and two train stations (Isleworth and St Margarets). Richmond is within easy access on foot or regular bus service, giving access to Richmond Station (District Line, Overground and South West Trains). The motorist also has quick access to the M4, M3 and M25.

Isleworth is a rare hidden gem and has fast become one of the sought after places to live in the immediate area. In more recent times, people have become aware of the location’s convenience and value in comparison to close areas such as Richmond and Twickenham. The area boasts the charm of eclectic Georgian townhouses and was once the home to Vincent Van Gogh.

Exclusively marketed with johns&co.

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

This brand new, two bedroom apartment is situated on the seventh floor of Ivy House at Verdo - Kew Bridge, TW8. The contemporary kitchen comes with fitted Siemens and Bosch appliances, and two double bedrooms main with ensuite, second double bedroom, both rooms feature fitted wardrobes. With engineered timber floor finishes throughout, the open plan living area provides direct access to a spacious balcony.

Verdo - Kew Bridge is a collection of contemporary apartments with access to lifestyle residents' amenities. The development is made up of three beautiful buildings - Ivy, Lily and Jasmine House - all surrounded by private landscaped gardens, allowing you to relax in a green oasis just a quick hop from central London.

Each home has easy access to the spacious residents' lounge, which boasts a work zone and private meeting room. A media room is available for watching films or sporting events, and there is a private residents' gym. The lounge spills directly out to the residents' podium gardens. The sunlit terraces and inviting play areas are ready and waiting to be explored and enjoyed.

The development is located at the heart of Brentford, which is being transformed into a vibrant new neighbourhood with shops, cafes, restaurants. A home at Verdo - Kew Bridge also puts you in touching distance of some of London's best loved high streets, including Kew Village and Chiswick.

agency_name: Legal & General Affordable Homes - The Moorings
detailedDescription:
Brunch In Brentford | Saturday 31st July 2021 | 10am - 1pm

Join us for a unique opportunity to explore The Moorings, Brentford and find out how Shared Ownership could help you take that step on to the property ladder sooner than you think.

Oh... And enjoy a selection of high quality handmade pastries, sandwiches, brioches, wraps and more - courtesy of brunch specialists Feather & Heart.

To book a place register your interest and our dedicated Sales Consultant will be delighted in helping you book your appointment.

Please note: In order to maintain social distancing, all visits to The Moorings will be by appointment only.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Live by the water, enjoying the open space and a wealth of nature. This 2 bed Shared Ownership apartment features luxurious interiors, spacious layouts, and private balcony. Move in from this Summer. Book your viewing today!

Plot A05,07, a 2 Bedroom apartment in The Moorings is available via Shared Ownership, the price shown is for a 75% share of the full market value of £615,000

Financial Breakdown:
Full market value: £615,000
75% share value: £461,250
10% deposit of 75%: £46,125
Rent on unowned share: £352 per month
Viewings by appointment only, book yours today!
An outstanding location

The Moorings offers thoughtfully designed apartments in a prime waterfront location within Brentford. Each home benefits from a terrace or a balcony providing private outside space, in addition to communal landscaped roof terraces with views across the River Brent.

This contemporary two-bedroom type 7 apartment features a modern interior that combines form and function, resulting in a beautifully designed home. Fitted with the latest a-rated appliances, impeccable finishes throughout and bright living areas, all constructed to the highest standards.

Plot A05.07 is a 898 sq ft apartment and available with Shared Ownership. The apartment enjoys a generous private South-East facing balcony and full height windows in both bedrooms. Also benefits from an allocated Undercroft car parking space.

Limited parking is available at The Moorings, please speak to the Sales Team for further information. Zip car membership is available to apartments without an undercroft parking space.

Situated in the city's garden
The Moorings is surrounded by some of London's best-loved parks and reserves. With such an abundance of green open spaces to explore, it couldn't be easier to escape the trappings of modern life and enjoy the very best of nature.
Take a stroll or a cycle along Brentford Lock or visit Syon Park and feel like you are in the deep countryside. Go further afield, across the River Thames, and find more green spaces such as Kew Gardens and Richmond Park.
The development is close to local shops, cafes, and restaurants along Brentford High Street and within easy reach is the original Westfield London.

What is shared ownership?

If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

The video tour is representative. It shows the 2 bedroom Type 20 show apartment at The Moorings.

This contemporary one-bedroom type 3 apartment features a modern interior that combines form and function, resulting in a beautifully designed home. Fitted with the latest a-rated appliances, impeccable finishes throughout and bright living areas, all constructed to the highest standards.

Plot A02.03 is a 581 sq ft apartment and available with Shared Ownership. This corner apartment has a large south-east facing private balcony and also has dual aspect full height windows in the bedroom.

Limited parking is available at The Moorings, please speak to the Sales Team for further information. Zip car membership is available to apartments without an undercroft parking space.

Situated in the city's garden
The Moorings is surrounded by some of London's best-loved parks and reserves. With such an abundance of green open spaces to explore, it couldn't be easier to escape the trappings of modern life and enjoy the very best of nature.

Take a stroll or a cycle along Brentford Lock or visit Syon Park and feel like you are in the deep countryside. Go further afield, across the River Thames, and find more green spaces such as Kew Gardens and Richmond Park.

The development is close to local shops, cafes, and restaurants along Brentford High Street and within easy reach is the original Westfield London.

What is shared ownership?

If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

The video tour is representative. It shows the 2 bedroom Type 20 show apartment at The Moorings.

detailedDescription:
This fantastic two-bedroom apartment is set on the 7th floor of Ivy House.

The modern kitchen comes with fitted Siemens and Bosch appliances, and the bedroom features an ensuite and contemporary fitted wardrobe. With engineered timber floor finishes throughout, this apartment benefits from two spacious balconies with access from both the living and bedroom areas.

Verdo - Kew Bridge is a collection of contemporary apartments with access to lifestyle residents' amenities. The development is made up of three beautiful buildings - Ivy, Lily and Jasmine House - all surrounded by private landscaped gardens, allowing you to relax in a green oasis just a quick hop from central London.

Each home has easy access to the spacious residents' lounge, which boasts a work zone and private meeting room. A media room is available for watching films or sporting events, and there is a private residents' gym. The lounge spills directly out to the residents' podium gardens. The sunlit terraces and inviting play areas are ready and waiting to be explored and enjoyed.

The development is located at the heart of Brentford, which is being transformed into a vibrant new neighbourhood with shops, cafes, restaurants. A home at Verdo - Kew Bridge also puts you in touching distance of some of London's best loved high streets, including Kew Village and Chiswick.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A spectacular townhouse in a private development on the banks of the River Thames in Chiswick. The property features a waterfront rear garden and an integral garage in addition to two off-street parking spaces.

The property has been tastefully modernised by its current owner, to include state-of-the-art systems including air conditioning, underfloor heating, a Lutron lighting system, and a three-zoned Sonos surround-sound system. Great attention to comfort and detail has been taken in the finish of the property, which includes imported stone and antique wooden flooring, an Italian leather wall and privacy screens on the windows facing the river.

The entrance level hosts the garage, which has space for three cars, a snug or office room to the rear, and a downstairs cloakroom which also houses a washer-dryer.

The first floor offers an excellent living and entertaining space, laid out in an open-plan arrangement made up of three sections. A bright living room with floor-to-ceiling windows looks out over the river and offers access to the garden, the mezzanine level hosts a dining area which can comfortably seat ten guests, and a tastefully-designed semi-open-plan kitchen features luxury appliances including and American fridge-freezer and a wine cooler.

The second floor hosts a tiled family bathroom with underfloor heating, two large double bedrooms complete with bespoke built-in wardrobes, and a third single bedroom which is currently arranged as an office.

The master suite is situated on the top floor, and consists of a large double bedroom with built-in wardrobes, a private dressing room, and an underfloor-heated en suite bathroom complete with stone his-and-hers sinks and showers, and an airing cupboard. This level also offers access to a roof terrace, which includes a Hydropool hot tub and overlooks the river.

Chiswick Quay is a peaceful private development on the waterfront, and this property is one of the few which overlooks both the marina and the River Thames. In addition to the Thames Path, the property also has access to an abundance of green spaces nearby, including Dukes Meadows and Chiswick House and Gardens. A selection of independent cafes and restaurants are located nearby in the Strand-on-the-Green area close to Kew Bridge, with a further range of shopping and dining opportunities close by on the Chiswick High Road.

Commuters benefit from proximity to Chiswick Mainline station, which offers rail connections towards Waterloo, and local bus routes, as well as access to free parking outside of the development. Motorists can access the A4/M4, North Circular and South Circular for excellent road links into and out of the city centre. Numerous well-regarded schools including Grove Park Primary School, Chiswick School, The Falcons Pre-Preparatory School and Strand-On-The-Green Junior School are also within easy walking distance.
